summary:
By request I am putting myself in game. I\'m level 10 ranger here and am sworn to protect you without being a pain. I am marriageable, and wont die on you.  I am living in Ivanstead at Vilemyr Inn. WARNING
You must have ApachiiHair running for this mod. Make sure it is before Lycan in the order.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

I Used:
descriptionHtml:
By request I am putting myself in game. I\'m level 10  ranger here and am sworn to protect you without being a pain. I am marriageable, and wont die on you.  I am living in Ivanstead at Vilemyr Inn. I love sexy outfits,so don\'t forget to dress me nice. I\'m good at sneaking and have good archer skills. Place nice,

NEW PHOTOS ADDED:  thanks to  turbosnowy http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22275/ for the sexy things.

BONUS, I seem to have made a mistake and added a bow to the game on the floor of the inn with Lycan, so its an added bonus to those who wish to take it.


WARNING
You must have ApachiiHair running for this mod. Make sure it is before Lycan in the order.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

I Used:

Better Females by Belle http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812

Apachii Hair of course

Armour is by Killer Keos http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654
=Highly Recommended Mods=

My home is your home: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045
(To set change her default location to somewhere else other than the inn

Ultimate Follower Overhaul: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037
author: Lycanheart
